description: Main entry point for a Flutter-based Notes application, setting up providers and launching the app with the root widget.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: Root widget for the Notes app, responsible for setting up theme, providers, and home page.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes the application by running the root widget 'NotesApp'.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the 'NotesApp', including provider setup and MaterialApp configuration.
